concept.title: Staying Safe When Using This Product

conbody.p: Before we start with instructions, it is necessary to inform you of any and all hazards associated with the use of these machines. Please read carefully before use.

ol.li: Make sure there are no liquids near any parts of the machine to avoid any risk of electric shock.
Make sure there is no damage to the cord or plug, and consult with the previous user to make sure no malfunctions occurred.
Always avoid contact with moving parts to avoid risk of injury.
Make sure the cord is out of the way and not hanging over the edge of a table or counter.
Never use sharp objects or utensils inside the freezer bowl to avoid any damages.
Unplug the machine before any cleaning or troubleshooting.
